name: Estate Sale
description:
This is a narrative game made with Unreal engine 4. With gorgeous visuals and stories. Your parents passed away. You need a certain amount of money to pay for a student loan. But also you want to keep things that remind you of them. Explore the house, find new objects with stories, and balance their sentimental and monetary value.

Team:

Yue Wang, Designer and Engineer,  https://www.yuewangld.com/

Sydney Ayers, Designer and Artist, https://www.sydneyayers.games/
